Package org.svvrl.goal.cmd

Class CmdUtil

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.cmd.CmdUtil
public class CmdUtil
extends java.lang.Object
CmdUtil provides utility methods for the command-line package.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • getIndent

      Returns a string for indents.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • encodeEditableAsString

      public static java.lang.String encodeEditableAsString​(Editable obj)
      Encodes an editable object as a string.
      Parameters:
      obj - an editable object to be encoded
      Returns:
      the encoded string of obj

    • castOrLoadEditable

      public static Editable castOrLoadEditable​(java.lang.Object obj) throws EvaluationException
      Tries to converts a specified object to an editable object. If the object is an editable object, cast it as an editable object. Otherwise, view the object as a file name and try to read an editable object from that file.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object to be converted
      Returns:
      an editable object retrieved from obj
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - if no editable object can be retrieved from obj

    • castOrLoadAutomaton

      public static Automaton castOrLoadAutomaton​(java.lang.Object obj) throws EvaluationException
      Tries to converts a specified object to an automaton.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object to be converted
      Returns:
      an automaton converted from obj
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - if obj does not represent an automaton

    • castOrLoadFSA

      public static FSA castOrLoadFSA​(java.lang.Object obj) throws EvaluationException
      Tries to converts a specified object to a finite state automaton.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object to be converted
      Returns:
      a finite state automaton converted from obj
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - if obj does not represent a finite state automaton

    • castAsCollection

      public static java.util.Collection<?> castAsCollection​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Returns a collection represented by a specified object. If the object is already a collection, simply cast it. Otherwise, treat the string representation of the object as a comma-separated array.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object
      Returns:
      a collection represented by the object

    • castAsMap

      public static java.util.Map<?,​?> castAsMap​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Returns a map represented by a specified object. If the object is already a map, simply cast it. Otherwise, treat the string representation of the object as a comma-separated entries.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object
      Returns:
      a map represented by the object

    • echo

      public static java.lang.String echo​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Returns a string representation of an object. If the object is a collection, a map, or an array, the glue between the elements will be newline.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object
      Returns:
      the string representation of obj

    • echo

      public static java.lang.String echo​(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.String glue)
      Returns a string representation of an object.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object
      glue - the glue between elements of the object if the object is a collection, a map, or an array
      Returns:
      the string representation of obj

    • assign

      public static void assign​(Context ctx, Lval lv, java.lang.Object obj) throws EvaluationException
      Assigns an object to a lval in a specified context.
      Parameters:
      ctx - a context
      lv - a lval value
      obj - an object which is the new value of lv
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - if there is an error in evaluating lvalues or expressions

      Splits a string, a collection, or a map.
      Parameters:

      obj - an object to be split
      Returns:
      the objects split from obj

    • save

      public static void save​(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.String filename) throws EvaluationException
      Saves an object to a file with the first working codec.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object to be saved
      filename - the name of the file
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - if there is any error in saving obj

    • save

      public static void save​(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.String filename, Codec codec) throws EvaluationException
      Saves an object to a file with a specified codec.
      Parameters:
      obj - an object to be saved
      filename - the name of the file
      codec - the codec used to encode obj
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - if there is any error in saving obj

    • unknown

      public static void unknown​(java.lang.String arg) throws EvaluationException
      Throws an exception stating that a specified argument is unknown.
      Parameters:
      arg - an unknown argument
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - always
